spells.html_content:
Spells

Friendship Word
/ Alchemical Word
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Coney that can heal or apply a shield.
If in the Controlled state, the Coney can also transform to inflict damage.

When it dies, the spell's cooldown period is set to 2 turns, and a glyph is placed under the Coney.
If the Coney is still alive when the spell is recast, it is teleported to the targeted cell and immobilised.
Required level: :
1|68|134

Normal effects

Summons Coney
Coney's Alchemical Rhetoric
Fixes the cooldown period of Friendship Word at 2 turn(s)
Coneyglyph
Teleports to the targeted cell
-100 MP (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Recast interval
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No

No

Spells

Tribal Paintbrush
/ Shrill Choir
6 Range / 3AP

Applies the Paint state to the target.

On a Painted target: spreads the state, heals allies and inflicts Earth damage on enemies in a 2-cell circle.

On the caster: consumes all Paints to inflict Earth damage on all Painted enemies.
• The damage is greater for each enemy hit.
• Increases the caster's Pushback Damage for each ally hit.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Alchemical Word
/ Friendship Word
1 - 5 Range / 2AP

Summons an empty, static Alchemical Vial that can explode when destroyed if it is full.

On one of the caster's full Vials: consumes the Vial's contents.
The contents can also be consumed by allies by inflicting damage on the Vial.

On one of the caster's empty Vials: destroys the Vial and reimburses the AP cost.

Using the spell on a Vial reimburses the use of the spell on the current turn.
Summoning an Alchemical Vial prevents any other Vial from being summoned on the same turn.
Required level: :
105|172

Normal effects

Summons Alchemical Vial
Vial's Alchemical Rhetoric
The Vial explodes
Consumes the Vial's contents
Increases the Alchemical Word spell's maximum number of casts per turn by 1

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Alchemical Word
details.description:
Summons an empty, static Alchemical Vial that can explode when destroyed if it is full.

On one of the caster's full Vials: consumes the Vial's contents.
The contents can also be consumed by allies by inflicting damage on the Vial.

On one of the caster's empty Vials: destroys the Vial and reimburses the AP cost.

Using the spell on a Vial reimburses the use of the spell on the current turn.
Summoning an Alchemical Vial prevents any other Vial from being summoned on the same turn.

The effects are removed after the spell has been cast.

On an ally: reduces the target's maximum Vitality and heals the target in the caster's best element.

/ Word of Recovery

On an ally in the Encouraged state: transfers 10% of the health points of all allies in the Encouraged state and 90% of the health points of all the caster's Fairies to the target.
